laboratory_examinations.findings: 20.0% on admission at other hospital; 20.1% on day 2 at other hospital; 19.4% on admission at this hospital; 32.9% during follow-up.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Decreased from 20.0% to 19.4% over days 2 to 3, then increased to 32.9% after treatment.

laboratory_examinations.findings: 7.5 g/dL at other hospital on admission; 7.2 g/dL on day 2 at other hospital; 11.1 g/dL on first admission at this hospital.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Increased from 7.5 g/dL to 11.1 g/dL after treatment.

laboratory_examinations.findings: 10,300 at other hospital on admission; 27,200 on day 2; 14,500 at this hospital.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Increased from 10,300 to 27,200 and then decreased to 14,500.

laboratory_examinations.findings: 53,000 at other hospital on admission; 87,000 on day 2; 122,000 on admission at this hospital; 67,000 during follow-up.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Increased from 53,000 to 122,000, then decreased to 67,000.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Positive for both IgG and complement.
Elevated at 461 U/L at other hospital, decreased to 484 U/L on admission at this hospital, and further decreased to 444 U/L and 416 U/L thereafter.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Initially elevated, then decreased over time.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Total bilirubin at 4.9 mg/dL on admission at other hospital, decreased to 2.0 mg/dL on day 2, and 1.5 mg/dL at this hospital.
